newsitem.title: USA: System Software ships new management product.
newsitem.headline: System Software ships new management product.

text.p: System Software Associates Inc said Thursday it began shipping on October 31, its new Release Management System product which allows automotive and other suppliers to better manage inventory.

The product offers three release tracking levels that can be applied to the order line manually or automatically, SSA said in a statement. The software was written to meet the requirements of the Big Three U.S. automakers, Ford Motor Co, General Motors Corp and Chrysler Corp, SSA added.
SSA develops and markets information systems and software to industrial manufacturers worldwide.
